saying: Even the smallest acorn may grow into the tallest tree.
description: Sally  is a normal, squirrel villager in the Animal Crossing series, appearing in almost all the games except for Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Originally appearing under the name Hazel in Animal Crossing, Sally replaces another squirrel villager, called Cally, who appeared in Animal Crossing; She is the first villager to have her English name changed. In Animal Crossing: New Leaf, a new squirrel called Hazel is also introduced. Her old name, "Hazel," relates to her species, which is commonly associated with nuts, as is her initial phrase, "nutmeg."
